name: I hope you can put on top.
name_original: I hope you can put on top.
description:
July 7 is a traditional Japanese day called Tanabata.

It is said that if you make a wish on this day, it will come true.

The Japanese in this game is "I wish that many people will enjoy my homebrew game." written in Japanese.

I post casual games every day.

Follow me:https://twitter.com/OkameBunny_365

(But the tweets are in Japanese.)

BGM:https://www.tauronmusic.tokyo
